summary: { HEY Y’ALL CHECK OUT MY ETSY STORE!!! } { BUY 3, GET 1 FREE is available! } WINTER SHIPPING CHANGES: Any orders placed ON or...
caption:
{ HEY Y’ALL CHECK OUT MY ETSY STORE!!! }

{ BUY 3, GET 1 FREE is available! }

WINTER SHIPPING CHANGES:

Any orders placed ON or AFTER December 16th won’t be shipped out until January 7th! This is so y'all can place orders while I’m on vacation, and in the store/during ordering this will show up as “3-4 weeks for shipping”.

As I said in an older post, I’ll be recovering from surgery starting in late January but I should be able to get my gf and friends to help me out with orders. If I need to do this again I’ll let y’all know!

Thank y'all very much!!! Reblogs would be v appreciated!

summary: Ochako is using her powers to make some paper birds float. Isn't she cute?  Time: 1 hr 30 minutes Materials: mechanical pencil,...
caption:
Ochako is using her powers to make some paper birds float. Isn’t she cute? 

Time: 1 hr 30 minutes

Materials: mechanical pencil, ink pens, gel pens, colored markers, acrylic paint

Songs listened to: Get Out- Churches, The Runners- The Naked and Famous, and Rollarcoaster- Bleachers (I thought it would be fun to share music wiht my speedpaints moving forward.)

Honest feedback, always welcome!

Kieran | 22 | they/them - agender

tags: functions under the dabi is a todoroki theory
this was written to a song btw
summary: BNHA - Dabi - Don’t Forget To Remember Me
title: BNHA - Dabi - Don’t Forget To Remember Me
body:
Dabi hadn’t really given himself the chance to miss home after leaving, but now that he’d run into Shoto and visited their mom, it was kind of catching up with him.

He hadn’t even thought about how hard his leaving would hit his mom and siblings - he’d only left to keep them safe, yet he’d gone and hurt them by doing so.

And well, it wasn’t like he hadn’t known they’d remember who he was. Sure, he’d begun hoping they’d forget he had ever existed, too ashamed to want to let them know he was still alive and relatively okay, but it was different knowing it and experiencing it.

He’d told his mom that he wouldn’t visit again any time soon - and he’d kept his word on that, he couldn’t just drop his work to go visit her no matter how much he wanted to, it would put her in danger.

But he had kept calling whenever he got the chance. He couldn’t visit her, but he didn’t want to just cut her out again. He’d missed her.

Of course, her nagging him about eating right and taking care of himself and you should really contact your siblings, Touya, they miss you was almost enough to make him regret his choice.

He didn’t bother to tell her that he still had Fuyumi’s number when she offered to give him all their numbers - an offer he denied, knowing it wasn’t a good idea for him to have the numbers, even though he wanted nothing more than to accept if only so he had a reliable way to contact all of them.

It was on one of these calls that what he’d been missing all these years really hit him. He should have stayed and toughed it out and just worked through his control issues even if it meant torturing himself.

“…hey mom,” he finally said once she’d stopped telling him about something Fuyumi had told her the last time she visited, getting a soft hum in answer. “I miss you guys. I’m really glad you didn’t forget me,”

“You think we would have forgotten you?”

Dabi swallowed his words down, marveling at the fact that his throat was so tight that it actually hurt to do so - when was the last time he’d gotten this emotional? Back before he left home? “I… had hoped so, yeah. But I’m glad you didn’t,”

The chastising tone in Rei’s voice was worth it, especially since it was tempered with a soft understanding.

This was worth the risk, he thought, even if it still hurt every time he had to say goodbye. He could deal with that.

tags: functions under the dabi is a todoroki theory
reminder that this is rp based if you have questions or concerns about what's happening lemme know!
kind of a long post sorry!
title: BNHA - Dabi drabbles part 2
body:
(Note: multiple drabbles. will be separated by a line break)

Dabi lifted his head off the bar as the others finally filtered in, locking his phone and setting it face down between his arms.

“About fucking time,” he grumbled despite knowing it was still only about six in the morning. “Eat and let’s get going, we’re wasting time I could spend doing something useful,”

Kurogiri heaved a sigh, though no one else seemed to have any complaints about the fact that food. “Did you use the stove this time?”

Dabi gave a challenging stare, though the flash of guilt that went through him softened it. He really shouldn’t be rushing Kurogiri and he knew it, considering the warp villain was kind enough to put them all up and deal with their shitty attitudes with no complaints. “Nope,”

“Oh, come on,” Toga complained immediately, though she didn’t push her food away like she had the first time he’d made food and it had been found out that he used his quirk rather than a stove to make it.

“Yeah, come on, finish eating, we have stuff to do!” Dabi snapped back, giving the blond a dark look.

Kurogiri moved behind the bar as this exchange was happening, setting to mixing drinks - Dabi knew that most of them were just so the other villain wouldn’t kill them before they completed their planning and finished the job.

Still, the next question caught him off guard. “Did you sleep at all? You’re rather animated this morning, Dabi,”

Dabi blinked, staring at the figure behind the bar before he stretched across again and rested his chin on his arms. “Nope. I’ll sleep either when I’m dead or we have this done, whichever happens last.”

This got a disappointed sound and a weird look from the rest of the villains, but that was fine. No big deal, he wouldn’t be dealing with this much longer either way this went.

It was weird, Dabi had decided one night while he was half asleep, having Shoto know who he was, that he was still alive, but not having contacted their other siblings since leaving.

Sure, he’d visited their mom, he’d even sent out those letters he’d been hoarding for years despite not knowing if they’d ever reach their recipients. Either way was fine by him, honestly.

Still, that didn’t feel like enough.

And really, he’d forever blame the fact that he hadn’t slept well at all since running into Shoto at the grocery shop a while back on the fact that he’d dialed Fuyumi’s number as he stared blankly at the ceiling one night. He hadn’t even expected an answer, so he’d nearly dropped the device when he got one.

He didn’t hear what she said, fumbling with the device and sitting upright suddenly, eyes wide as he brought his phone back up to his ear just in time to hear Fuyumi ask if he was still there.

“…yeah.” Oh god, his voice sounded like he’d been smoking - he hadn’t, but his heart felt like it was in his throat, he couldn’t exactly help how it sounded.

“Okay, making sure. I’m so glad to hear from you! Are you okay? Have you contacted anyone else?”

Dabi went to respond, then just let out a disoriented sound and plopped back down on the futon. What was he supposed to tell her? Yeah, I’m fine, villainy is treating me just fine. I didn’t mean to call, though? He wasn’t sure that would go over well with his younger sister.

His name brought him back from his thoughts, and he blinked to reorient himself again. “Sorry, Fuyu. I’m fine, I’ve talked to Shoto and Mom. You and Natsuo have some letters coming in the mail. I’m sorry,”

He hung up before she could respond, not entirely sure he could handle more of a conversation than that. He didn’t want to answer questions.

As soon as Shoto was back at U.A. and Dabi had made himself comfortable inside again, he let out a tired groan.

Fighting Shoto took a lot out of him, especially since he really didn’t even want to be fighting the kid.

He understood they weren’t on the same side, but really, he had better things to do than play spy and hurt a bunch of kids who were just trying to fucking survive at this point.

Even if he acted otherwise.

Still, now that it was just him, he went about checking out his own injuries, changing a few of the staples that had been bent when he hit the tree - and god damn it, he was glad he’d waited because it hurt like a bitch and even clenched teeth couldn’t keep the whimper silent.

He didn’t ever want Shoto to know about the aftermath. He never wanted to leave his baby brother with any regrets.

Besides, the pain wasn’t so unusual - he’d been living in a state of constant pain long enough to be able to handle a bit more for the sake of his brother.

Though, he really did hope that he didn’t want another fight any time soon. He’d risked enough this time, using his Quirk like he had without giving himself enough of a cool down period on it until the fight had ended.

Shoto was strong, and while he was proud of that, he really fucking hated it because it caused his life to be difficult and it meant their father really was a piece of shit.

It’d be fine. He’d spend the next couple days curled up healing, only moving for food and other basic necessities, and that’d be that. No big deal.

blog.description: Fucking superb, you funky little grenade. All ships are welcome on this blog (unless its a pairing with a teacher or adult.) (a blog dedicated to anything Bakugou related. Ask box is always open and don't be afraid to ask for something to be tagged.) header commissioned from @feorie

//CAUTION: SPOILERS\

((Sniff I’m rootin’ for you, kiddo-!!))

- Mod Mug

blog.name: incorrectbnhaquotes
blog.title: season 3 amirite
blog.description: things that were 100% definitely said in boku no hero academia. not spoiler free. tracking the tag #incorrectbnhaquotes. submissions open!

summary:
Twice: that atoms that make up my body aren't mine. it's just my time to use them
Dabi: mum says its my turn with the carbon
body:
Twice: that atoms that make up my body aren't mine. it's just my time to use them
Dabi: mum says its my turn with the carbon

dialogue.label: Twice:

dialogue.phrase: mum says its my turn with the carbon
